Plot: A violent, suspended police detective investigates a brutal murder, in which a seductive woman could be involved.
Title: Basic Instinct
Actors: Michael Douglas, Sharon Stone, George Dzundza, Jeanne Tripplehorn
tomatoConsensus: Unevenly echoing the work of Alfred Hitchcock, Basic Instinct contains a star-making performance from Sharon Stone but is ultimately undone by its problematic, overly lurid plot.
Awards: Nominated for 2 Oscars. Another 5 wins & 17 nominations.
